subject: Trout
Fishing, Sport
Fish and Other Marine Life
lead_paragraph: A hydrologist named Dave Rosgen helped transform a part of the Rio Blanco in Colorado from a wide and shallow stream to a deep river and a prime spot for anglers.
snippet: A hydrologist named Dave Rosgen helped transform a part of the Rio Blanco in Colorado from a wide and shallow stream to a deep river and a prime spot for anglers.
